Class JsonBindingSupport

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.helidon.media.jsonb.server.JsonBindingSupport
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Handler, Service, BiConsumer<ServerRequest,ServerResponse>

    public final class JsonBindingSupport
extends Object
implements Service, Handler
    A Service and a Handler that provides JSON-B support to Helidon.
